title: How To Embrace A Soft Modern Interior Style
description: Rosanna Ceravolo of Studio Ceravolo, is a master of subtle contrast. The Melbourne-based architect applies texture and colour in harmony, while form and finishes play in the balance. Soft curves meet angular details, warm colours sit happily with cooler tones, and smooth metals accompany textural fabrics â€” never overdone. Below, she shares her top tips for recreating this soft modern style with a few of her favourite pieces from the Design Directory!
author: The Design Files
